name: Regressed Genius Creates Mythic Items
author: Hong Ah Jin
content: On the day of the Earth&#039s destruction, Level 1 Alchemist Kim Si-moon forged the Philosopher&#039s Stone, which can do anything if an equivalent exchange is established.[What do you desire?]Right now, all he want is to destroy the Earth, to give the man responsible for his brother&#039s death a good kicking, and to live a life without magic! He thought he&#039d ended his life full of regrets... yet he woke up 11 years in the past.This time, he&#039ll undo his miserable life as a disenchanted
